[h1]Overview[/h1] V1.1
Ultra tech shielded armour with unique "ghosting" capabilities, defensive proximity burst, caltrops pods, grappling hook and high tech rail weapons using neuro-toxins and shuriken ammunition.
Haywire tech, effective against mechanoids.
It is provided as an expansion mod for RimPlas that makes use of the advanced material options provided.
[h1]Mod Details[/h1]
Details for this mod are provided in a PDF Document:
[url=https://1drv.ms/b/s!Au3GsmKyQkDYivld9ATGSE6toE-jaw?e=ABY4KR]Ghost Gear Notes[/url]
[h1]Mod Compatibilities[/h1] *** Subject to conversion ***
[b]Camouflage and Stealth[/b] - enables both passive and active camouflage on Ghost Gear power armour. [b]Diseases Overhauled[/b] - Nerve Antitoxin can be used to cure Lymphatic mechanites. [b]Industrialisation[/b] - Galena can be deep mined and smelting recipes for lead provided for the electric arc furnace. [b]Medical Supplements[/b] - Ethyl Mercury used as an optional neurotoxin precursor, Antinites will cure nerve toxin. [b]Rimatomics[/b] - Power Armour helmet will provide some radiation protection. [b]Tactical Charge Gear[/b] - Additional delivery systems for Haywire tech. [b]Utility Supplements[/b] - Mind killer liquid can be used as an optional neurotoxin. [b]VFE - Production[/b] - Dedicated fabrication bench will make use of add-ons/attachments.
Includes native Multiplayer support.
The mod is not currently patched for CE at this time.
